markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Silent Heart](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1807)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305</row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71) teaches that the true heart is impenetrable, dedicated only to knowledge. This tattoo of a venom-soaked heart provides a +1 item bonus to [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1467" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
